name: Blade Runner: The Roleplaying Game - Basic
author: Michael Card (Emo Cthulhu)

rows.name: Health & Resolve
rows.text: H: {b} system.health.value {/b} / system.health.max {newline} R: {b} system.resolve.value {/b} / system.resolve.max

rows.name: STR Group
rows.text: STR: {b} d system.attributes.str {/b} {newline} {newline} HtH: d system.skills.closeCombat / {b} d system.skills.closeCombat + d system.attributes.str {/b} {newline} For: d system.skills.force / {b} d system.skills.force + d system.attributes.str {/b} {newline} Stam: d system.skills.stamina / {b} d system.skills.stamina + d system.attributes.str {/b}

rows.name: AGL Group
rows.text: AGL: {b} d system.attributes.agi {/b} {newline} {newline} Fire: d system.skills.firearms / {b} d system.skills.firearms.value + d system.attributes.agi {/b} {newline} Mob: d system.skills.mobility / {b} d system.skills.mobility + d system.attributes.agi {/b} {newline} Stea: d system.skills.stealth / {b} d system.skills.stealth + d system.attributes.agi {/b}

rows.name: INT Group
rows.text: INT: {b} d system.attributes.int {/b} {newline} {newline} Med: d system.skills.medicalAid / {b} d system.skills.medicalAid.value + d system.attributes.int {/b} {newline} Obs: d system.skills.observation / {b} d system.skills.observation + d system.attributes.int {/b} {newline} Tech: d system.skills.tech / {b} d system.skills.tech + d system.attributes.int {/b} {newline} {newline} Driving*: d system.skills.driving

rows.name: EMP Group
rows.text: EMP: {b} d system.attributes.emp {/b} {newline} {newline} Con: d system.skills.connections / {b} d system.skills.connections.value + d system.attributes.emp.value {/b} {newline} Ins: d system.skills.insight / {b} d system.skills.insight + d system.attributes.emp {/b} {newline} Man: d system.skills.manipulation / {b} d system.skills.manipulation + d system.attributes.emp {/b}
